products.description:
BOOYAH Pad Crasher | 14g | 6.5cm 


The BOOYAH Pad Crasher hollow body frog is tough and packs a punch. It’s extremely snag-proof for use on surface vegetation or in heavy cover.
 The BOOYAH Pad Crasher soft plastic hollow body frog features a plastic with just the right consistency to ensure solid, consistent hook-ups while remaining weed- and snag-free. The belly features 'chines' that make 'walking the frog' easy in open water, and it's just the right weight for pulling over slop or through the pads for big bass. Realistic decoration schemes and adjustable spinnerbait-style legs seal the deal for big bass. A drain hole at the tail of the bait keeps it working flawlessly.

products.title: Scum Frog Launch Series |  20g | 1pcs/pkt | 7cm
products.description:
Scum Frog Launch Series | 20g | 1pcs/pkt | 7cm

Do you guys fish on the weekend? Life is too short for that. After being crafted from 100s of hours of on-the-water product testing and refinement, this all-new, ultra-long casting Launch Frog is every fisherman's prayer as it comes with the new pinnacle of technical design and gives a splendid performance in a top water frog. 
The secret of Launch Frog’s performance is it's unique tungsten “parasite” weight system adding weight without bulk to the hook shank. So, to fish or not to fish? What a stupid question.
Compared to other baits, this bait gives you maximum distance in a top water frog while premium Owner hooks and high compression body deliver the highest hook-up rate possible in a hollow body frog and also delivers a super-soft high compression wide body design wrapped around a premium 5/0 Owner RED double frog hook basically for maximum water displacement and buoyancy. Oh yes, we're gonna need a bigger boat!Taking advantage of the famous Scum Frog brass button rear-weight this bait maintains a nose-up frog profile critical to frog performance. Every Launch Frog is finished in a 40-strand premium silicone skirt. So be ready to bait the bigger fish.


Features:

Manufactured at American Baitworks in Mississippi, USA
Heaviest frog in the Scum Frog line up (weighs in between 5/8oz and 3/4oz)
Larger body for increased buoyancy 
Brass button-style tail weight
Internal tungsten weight system
Premium 5/0 Owner “RED” double frog hook
40 strand premium silicone skirt 
Comes in eight digitally printed realistic colors
Made of domestic and imported contents
The Product length is excluding the skirt

About the Parasite Tungsten Weight System:
Scum Frog’s proprietary weight system was developed specifically for the company’s Launch Frog. The parasite system is a tungsten weight with integrated locking tabs that enables the weight to be attached securely onto the shank of the Owner hook to ensure proper weight distribution and consistent performance with every frog we build in our Mississippi-based manufacturing facility.

products.title: Scum Frog Trophy Series | 15g | 1pcs/pkt
products.description:
Scum Frog Trophy Series | 15g | 1pcs/pkt
Well, they say the most ideal route to an angler's heart is through his bait. So you'd rather be fishing with this bait. With this fresh new look, the Scum Frog Trophy Series Painted Frog is now available in highly realistic colors which are meticulously designed by award-winning, internationally renowned lure artist Andrew Gardner. Made with a proprietary manufacturing process, each Scum Frog Trophy Series Painted Frog features a digitally patterned color on the outside, with an extremely durable finish that won’t wear off after multiple aggressive fish catches.
Specially made for working the edges of vegetation, the Scum Frog Trophy Series Painted Frog is designed to ride low and push a lot of water for more surface disturbance to trigger aggressive blow-ups. It's ultra-soft plastic body also walks the dog with ease and instantly collapses providing it with an excellent hookup ratio. On the rear, it is equipped with a patented keel hole that allows the frog to self-drain at the beginning of every cast to ensure a proper presentation. Armed with an Owner hook that delivers lightning-fast hook sets, the Scum Frog Trophy Series Painted Frog gives frog fishing a new level of detail.
Features:

Big, pre-weighted bait for big fish
Sits higher in the water than standard frogs
Long, supple filament legs deliver erratic kicking action
Large, easily-seen 3/8" reflective eyes
Ultrasharp, well-hidden Owner hooks.

Description
 
 
Prodigy Buzzbait has a 11 cm length and weight of 27g and comes with equipments such as premium extra strong single hook, stainless steel propeller, stainless steel ball bearing, 3D eye and high quality silicone skirts. 
Designed to create loud clanking sound this has a perfect lure to attract fishes that usually prey on water surfaces. In order to produce loud clanking sound, Prodigy buzzbait has been designed with 3 kinds of metal contacts, first the rotating buzzbait, second a loud sound created from the contact between the rotating buzzbait and the strong aluminum clacker  and the third sound produced from the buzzbait in contact with stainless steel ball bearing planted on the buzzbait body underneath the buzzbait.  
Prodigy buzzbait lures not only loud in sound its also loud in action, these lures are perfect long cast and accurate cast lures.

products.title: Mega Frox Jumbo Frog 6.5cm | 17.5g | 1pcs/pck
products.description:
Mega Frox Jumbo Frog 6.5cm | 17.5g | 1pcs/pck 

MegaFrox lures are inspired and designed based on the actual species. Each lure is 100% handcrafted and painted by our skilled artists. Where no one lure will ever be identical to one another.
A tough & non-toxic resin-based lure body combined with internal rattling, a strong stainless steel through-wire, also equipped with an extremely sharp hook and weed guard makes every single lure a perfect fish-catching tool.
Description
MegaFrox Jumbo Frog lures are designed to “fly”, with length of 6.5 cm and 17.5 g. in weight, Jumbo Frog lures certainly are the lure that you need for accurate and long-casting. Jumbo frog lures are very versatile lures, with the constant retrieve and occasionally pause, the deadliest action is the “surface cruising action” which cause disturbance on top of the water surface, combined with internal rattling feature which cause vibrations and noise, it makes Jumbo frog irresistible to every active fishes. Beside the “Surface cruising action”, you can also pop-it or occasionally jerk-it to produce a splashing action.   Jumbo frog lures are designed to work under the choppy water condition as well where it slices to the water and yet produce a deadly “Surface cruising action”  Jumbo frog lures are equipped with Lures Factory’ adjustable weed-guard which allows you to fish in the heavy covered surface area to lure out the ambush predatory fishes. You confidently fish in any potential spots which you’re never dream its possible!
Recommended Action:
- Steady retrieve.
- Steady retrieves with pause.
- Twitch with pause.
- Steady Retrieve with jerk / pop.
- Fast retrieve with twitch.
Product Features: Vividly Hand-Painted, Super Sharp Hooks, Internal rattling chamber, Premium strong double hook, High quality skirts and an Adjustable weed guard.Product Weight: 17.5g/0.62oz (Because each lure is Handmade and Hand-Painted, appearance and weights may vary slightly from lure to lure.)
Product Length: 17.5cm/175mm
Hook Size: 3/0
Weight with packaging: 33g

Description
As the name implies, these frogs are typically found in very tall trees or other high-growing vegetation. They do not normally descend to the ground, except to mate and spawn, though some build foam nests on leaves and rarely leave the trees at all as adults.  Many tree frogs can change their color for better camouflage. For instance, the gray tree frog can change its color from green to gray.  Tree frogs bodies are relatively tiny and both its finger and toe tips are designed to graps on trees. MegaFrox Tree Frog Jr. Lures are exactly designed to the real-life tree frog species that you see find in the wild.  Tree Frog Jr lures are made to match its real-life sizes and therefore tree frog lures are perfect lures for fishing predatory fishes that are commonly found hanging around the overhead tree branches near the water surface and waiting for the opportunity that one prey will fallen into the water or hanging out too near to the water surface. With weed-guard, tree frog lures can easily imitate that actions and catch those fishes that you would never think its possible before.

- Twitch with pause.

Description
The leopard frog is perhaps most recognizable as the formaldehyde-soaked specimen in the high school lab tray. Leopard frogs are named so for the array of irregularly shaped dark spots that adorn their backs and legs. They are greenish-brown in color with a pearly white underside and light-colored ridges on either side of their backs. Leopard frogs generally live near ponds and marshes, but will often venture into well-covered grasslands as well, earning them their other common name, the meadow frog. Leopard frogs will eat just about anything they can fit in their mouths. They sit still and wait for prey to come by, then pounce with their powerful legs. They eat beetles, ants, flies, worms, smaller frogs, including their own species, and even birds, and garter snakes. Leopard Frog lures are designed to create a subtle popping sound and on the steady speed retrieve it will splash and pushes water on the surface. Leopard frog lures are ideally can be use for places where the fishing pressures are high.

Description
Red-Eyed frogs are found in tropical lowlands from southern Mexico, throughout Central America, and in northern South America. Nocturnal carnivores, they hide in the rain forest canopy and ambush crickets, flies, and moths with their long, sticky tongues.
These iconic rain-forest amphibians sleep by day stuck to leaf-bottoms with their eyes closed and body markings covered. When disturbed, they flash their bulging red eyes and reveal their huge, webbed orange feet and bright blue-and-yellow flanks. This technique, called startle coloration, may give a bird or snake pause, offering a precious instant for the frog to spring to safety. Lures Factory’ Red Eyed Frog Jr. are just designed to mimic the actual Red Eyed Frogs in the wild.
Red eyed frogs are designed in such a way that it can glide through the top water obstacles such as weed and etc, with relatively small body, Red Eyed Frogs able to create water disturbance to attract fishes.

products.description:
Z-Man Finesse FrogZ 2.75inch | 4g | 4/pack
DESCRIPTION

The smaller cousin to our popular Hard Leg FrogZ, the Finesse FrogZ offers the same buzz-frog design and buoyant ElaZtech construction that sets the Z-Man version apart from other toads on the market. Ideally rigged with a 2/0 EWG style hook, the Finesse FrogZ features a scaled-down profile that is perfect for pond fishing, small creeks and streams, and light tackle, as well as situations where finicky fish call for a finesse approach.


FEATURES







Compact design is ideal when conditions dictate a smaller profile topwater presentation


Twin paddle feet create attention-getting, bubbling surface action on the retrieve


Buoyant 10X Tough ElaZtech® construction allows the bait to float at rest and withstand multiple vicious strikes from surface predators


Belly and dorsal hook pockets for maximum hook protection and effortless hooksets


4 baits per pack

Suggested EWG Worm Hook Sizes
Noeby : 1/0, 1
Gamakatsu : 2/0, 1/0, 1

products.title: Jackall Good Meal Spin Blade+ 5g-7g|52mm-58mm
products.description:
The Goodmeal Spin Blade + is a small tail spin that can be used with any type of fish and in any location . It has an additional blade, making it the Goodmeal Spin Blade+. The target fish are the same as before, small migratory fish such as mackerel, horse mackerel, and barracuda at sea fishing parks and embankments, and black porgy and sea bass (seigo size) in rivers, but the additional blade makes it possible to generate stronger flashing (reflection) and vibration (water movement).
Despite its small body, it has a strong appeal and can attract fish from a wider range. It is also effective in situations where it is difficult for fish to notice you, such as during dim light or when the water is murky. Although it has more parts, there are very few problems, so you can enjoy fishing comfortably.
The basic usage is simple, just wind it in. The two blades attached to the tail and hook rotate to appeal to fish. Available in 5g and 7g sizes, the trick to increasing your catch is to use the right one depending on the water depth and the layer where the fish are swimming. It also supports lift and fall, which moves the rod up and down. This action is effective for rockfish and rockfish that hide near walls such as embankments and around tetrapods.Aim for more catches with the Good Meal Spin Blade+, which has big power in its small body!

products.description:
Simply cast and reel and the blade will rotate, attracting fish with a flash. The compact body allows you to target a variety of fish, regardless of size. 
With outstanding flight distance and trouble-free performance. By concentrating the centre of gravity on the face, the flight posture is stable and you can fly further. In addition, the bulge on the face suppresses the movement of the hook, reducing the trouble of carrying the hook or getting tangled. 
Comes with a snap that is convenient for changing lures. Lures can be changed without retying the line. 
The blade uses a specifically designed original blade that rotates firmly even in the fall and continues to attract fish. 
Features:

Compact Body (52mm / 5g)
Integrated Spinner Blade
High-Quality Treble Hook
Realistic Finish & Colors

products.title: Jackall Flag Trap Leaf |40g
products.description:
Jackall Flag Trap Leaf |40g

A flat body that dances like a leaf

The flat shape design enables a slower fall than the original model. This slow action is very effective when aiming for rock fish, flat fish, Red sea bream, etc., which are not good at preying on fast-moving prey.
Basic action

Since there are many fish near the bottom where slow action is effective, please invite them by lift and fall centring on the bottom after landing. In addition, it is recommended for beginners who are not used to the operation because it grabs the water firmly even when it is steadily reeling.
Comes standard with a hook with a tie

Equipped as standard with an assist hook with a tie set. By being conspicuous in the water, it becomes a bite marker, encourages bite on the hook, and contributes to improving the hooking-up rate.
features:-
cup shape

A stream of water is created on the cup side during the fall, creating a slower fall.

Asymmetrical design

By increasing the difference between the left and right volumes, you can quickly and reliably shift to the fall posture (horizontal posture).

Front center of Gravity Design

Place the center of gravity slightly forward. It contributes not only to slow falls but also to stabilizing posture during swimming.

glow processing colour

products.title: Murrvy Metal Long Cast Jig | Weight: 40g-50g
products.description:
Precision-Crafted Perfection: Murrvy Metal Long Cast Jigs are meticulously engineered for the dedicated angler, offering a level of precision that caters to the demands of avid fishing enthusiasts.


Long Casting Mastery: Designed to excel in the pursuit of trophy catches, these jigs feature a streamlined design for exceptional casting distances, reaching deeper spots with ease. Say goodbye to unreachable fishing grounds!


Durable Epoxy Armor: The battle-tested durability of Murrvy Metal Long Cast Jigs is enhanced by a resilient epoxy coating. This armour not only safeguards against the elements but ensures your lure remains in peak condition, ready for action whenever the need arises.


True-to-Life Fish Colors: Immerse your lure in the realism of nature with a vibrant array of life-like fish colors. Whether you're after bass, trout, or other game fish, these meticulously chosen hues mimic the aquatic environment, increasing your chances of a successful strike.


Holographic Scales Attraction: Stand out from the competition with the captivating holographic scales design. This innovative feature not only adds visual appeal but acts as a beacon underwater, attracting curious fish from a distance and enticing them to strike.


Weighted Versatility: Tailor your approach to different fishing conditions effortlessly. Murrvy Metal Long Cast Jigs offer a range of weights – 40g, 50g, and 60g – providing you with the flexibility to adapt and optimize your technique for various depths and scenarios.

Life-Like Fish Colors: Immerse your bait in the underwater world with a selection of life-like fish colors. Tailored to match the appearance of prey, these hues are designed to attract a variety of game fish and maximize your chances of a successful strike.


Holographic Scales Attraction: Enhance your lure's visibility with a mesmerizing holographic scales design. This eye-catching feature reflects light underwater, creating an alluring sparkle that captures the attention of nearby fish, increasing your chances of a successful hook-up.


 Versatile Weight Options: Adapt to different fishing scenarios effortlessly with Murrvy Metal Slow Jigs, available in versatile weights of 30g, 40g, and 50g. Whether you prefer finesse or a heavier approach, these jigs cater to the preferences of all anglers.


Perfect for All Anglers: Whether you're a seasoned pro or just starting, Murrvy Metal Slow Jigs are designed for universal appeal. Perfect for anglers of all skill levels, these jigs bring a new level of excitement to your fishing experience.


Elevate your angling game with Murrvy Metal Slow Jigs – where natural movement, durability, and versatility come together for an unmatched fishing adventure.

Description:


Recently, slow jigging has taken off and proved itself as a productive method of catching various species. The Drag Metal Cast slow has been developed through careful evaluation of the method and how it is so productive.
The asymmetrical flat side of the body creates a short pitched fluttering during the fall, giving fish a short but necessary time to bite, while reducing the drag against the lure which can be quite stressful for anglers fishing all day long.
This asymmetrical aspect of the lure tends to affect casting distance, but through subtle weight balance distribution, we have overcome this problem, giving it outstanding casting distance.
In order to reduce snags, it is loaded with two assist hooks on the front (with tinsels) and one assist hook at the rear.

products.title: Lucky John AYU | 1.1inch | 2.4g
products.description:
AYU spoon-baits are the most popular lures for trout angling, since “finding a key” to angling of this fish is the easiest with these lures. They have classic shape of a stretched drop, slightly bent profile of the body and the centre of gravity shifted to the tail. Thanks to the shape of the body, these spinners have good aerodynamic qualities and, hence, greater casting range. 
The lures are highly efficient when angling the fish in shallow water and mid-water. Once the lure gets into the water, it creates an attractive splash for the trout. The heaviest spinner might be dragged practically along the bottom at slow reeling.

products.title: Molix Jugulo Casting Jig | Size: 9cm | 40g
products.description:
The Jugulo Casting Jig is assembled with high quality materials and paints very resistant to the stress that lures dedicated to salt water use usually suffer. The aerodynamic body, has a special weights distribution that causes an action very similar to the behavior of a forage fish in the midst of his school. Thanks to its unique shape it casts in an excellent way and has unique swimming action, a fact that is acknowledged by the fishermen who picked it as one of the most sought after casting jig of the recent times. This success is due solely to its fishing quality, since is often able to outperform competitors.
Jugulo has been designed to be easily used by shore or boat fishermen, does not require, in fact, a high experience to bring results. Tuna, Bonito, Little tunny, Dolphin Fish, Sea Bass and Amberjack are some of its favorite prey, but its range extends to the tropics.

products.description: The CJM 115B is a hybrid lure that combines the peculiarities and the strengths of a classic metal jig with the realism and the hydrodynamics of a hard bait. The result is a sinking lipless minnow with a very high specific weight in relation to the dimensions. This lure is characterized by an excellent castability, typical of a jig and the sinuosity typical of a stick minnow.The small size of this lure faithfully imitates the size of the forage fish, the main prey of the coastal and offshore predators. This characteristic makes the lure extremely versatile both for inshore and offshore fishing.The oscillation while the bait is sinking, combined with the pauses during the retrieval, triggers the attack of the predators. The particular groove of the snout, in the front part of the bait improves its movement both with a linear retrieval and with strong jerks.The body made of ABS is very resistant. The 3D technology and the UV coating make the colors more brilliant, durable and improves the appearance.SINKINGWeight: 28 g (1 oz)

products.title: Lucky John Shelt Blade Spinner | Size: #1-#4 | 3-15g
products.description:
Shelt Blade is the series of spinners from Lucky John. These lures use modern design solutions, which ensure reliable and stable action. It is lightweight, made of brass, and has good dynamic properties when rotating in water, thus allowing the guiding of the lure at minimum speed. The blade kicks into gear as soon as the lure starts moving. The blades are painted from both sides. Regardless of the angle, at which predatory fish looks at the lure, its color remains equally attractive. In Shelt Blade Tungsten Body model, the core consists of tungsten balls, which increases casting distance in comparison to the standard version. All triple hooks feature a bright fly, the main purpose of which is to take away any doubts from predatory fish which is ready to attack.

products.title: Lucky John Bonnie Blade Spinner | Size: #1-#5 | 2.7-13.4g
products.description:
Bonnie Blade is a new series of Lucky John spinners. These lures combine modern design solutions that ensure reliable and stable playing of spinners and, most importantly, make them very attractive for any predatory fish. A spinning blade is the main element of the spinners. It is lightweight, is made of brass, and has good dynamic properties when spinning in the water, thus it allows performing reeling of the lure at minimum speed. The blade is wound up as soon as the spinner starts to move. The blades are painted from both sides. No matter from which side the fish is looking, the blade’s color will remain the same and attractive, which increases the interest of the fish in the lure and, as a result, ends up in an effective attack. Another important element is a mandrel, which influences the weight and casting range of the lure, as well as its stability in the water. Two types of mandrels are used in Bonnie Blade spinners: balls and cylindrical. Thanks to the main ball, the center of gravity of the spinner are shifted to its tail end, thus increasing the casting range of its smaller models. A cylindrical mandrel of larger models is made of brass with crosswise grooves, which, undoubtedly, increase the lure’s attractiveness, as well as stabilize its horizontal position when moving in the water. Metal ball-bearings and a reflective cone are intended for easy spinning of the blade around its axis and prevent its “sticking”. Rigid fixing wire of the blade, which is made of steel unriveted wire drilled from the sides, ensures complete freedom of spinning of the blade with minimum friction with the axis of the lure. All the trebles have a bright fly, the main function of which is to take away all the doubts from the predatory fish ready to attack. Moreover, the fly plays the role of a stabilizer of horizontal stability. The base of the spinner is stainless carbon wire. Its axis will not deform in extreme situations, and the lure will always be in operable condition.

products.title: Freedom Spinner Bait Double Willow | 21g
products.description:
Built using Freedom’s revolutionary hybrid head design, the Freedom Live Action Spinnerbait grabs fishes' attention with a lethal combination of free-swinging action and vivid flash. For maximum movement, the hook on the Freedom Live Action Spinnerbait is attached using their advanced interchangeable hook design which gives trailers a natural swimming presentation.
In addition, this hook release system allows for quick and easy replacement, so anglers can pre-rig a variety of trailers and switch them out without ever having to retie. Also, the revolutionary design keeps fish from using the lure as leverage to spit the hook, resulting in more landed fish.
From end-to-end, the Freedom Live Action Spinnerbait features premium components, including a super bright Willow/Colorado blade combo, top-of-the-line swivel, and a spring lock trailer keeper. Finished with a hardened epoxy finish for long-lasting durability, the Freedom Live Action Spinnerbait delivers a bright, highly attractive presentation that will help trigger strikes from otherwise uninspired fish.

products.title: Hayabusa Jack Eye Kick Tail  Saltwater Vertical Jig  | 40g | 7cm
products.description:
Jack Eye Kick Tail is an inchiku style casting jig that can be used from shore or boat. This casting jig catches a large variety of fish from the top of the water column to the bottom by changing your retrieve speed.
When reeled in, the jig’s Kick Tail moves naturally to attract fish as the body design displaces water. On the fall, it creates life-like wobbling action and ultimately shakes the rubber skirted tail as well. The jigs body has a distinct flashing appeal and its natural action will trigger many species of fish to strike. One of the most effective techniques is to lift and drop the jig slowly and continuously around the bottom, especially when targeting fluke or rockfish.
Targeted fish: Tune, Yellowtail, Dolphin, Red Snapper, Grouper, Mackerel, Fluke, Flounder, Rockfish, etc.

Most hits are usually encountered right after the pause.

products.description:
Mepps Aglia Long | 1.5g-29g
Description:
All Mepps Aglia Longs are deep running spinners with willow leaf blades. The blade "hugs" the body of the spinner during retrieve, allowing it to stay in deep pockets long enough to attract a wide variety of fish.
Lure size is important. Keep in mind plain spinners present a smaller profile than dressed spinners, so they will appear smaller to the fish. This makes them perfect for panfish and small stream trout. 
A #00 Aglia Long is an Ultra Lite spinner. It weighs only 1/18 oz. A #4 Aglia Long, by contrast weighs 1/2 oz. The Mepps Aglia Long, in all styles, like the Mepps Aglia, is extremely popular with fishermen world-wide because it will catch just about any freshwater fish and many species of saltwater fish.
Plain Aglia Longs in size #1 are perfect for larger stream trout. Size #1, #2, & #3 plain Aglia Longs are excellent for smallmouth bass and walleye. Plain Aglia Longs in sizes #3 and #4 are ideal for large rainbow trout and steelhead, as well as coho (silver) and chinook (king) salmon.

products.title: Mepps Musky Killer | 15g
products.description:
Mepps Musky Killer | 15g
Description:
There isn't a lot that can be said about the Mepps Musky Killer that hasn't already been said by musky fishermen world-wide. This is because the Mepps Musky Killer has caught more record musky than any other musky bucktail.
Sunny fall days will provide calm afternoon water, and are excellent times to fish a Musky Killer in the cabbage weeds. It’s here the muskys go to warm themselves. They also take advantage of the shadows to stalk their prey. Because of the similarity of weather conditions, this is also an excellent place to find muskys in the early summer.
Musky season opens early on many shallow northern musky lakes, and fishing these cold waters can be the key to early season action. A slow presentation is needed, and the Musky Killer's blade, like the blade on all Mepps spinners, begins spinning at even the slowest retrieve. Fish shallow bays and large flats of weeds early in the season with a Mepps Musky Killer.

products.title: Mepps Giant Killer | 35g
products.description:
Mepps Giant Killer | 35g
Description:
The Mepps Giant Killer is an extremely versatile big-game lure that is effective in both fresh and saltwater. Tandem Giant Killers is the top producer of musky and northern pike. They also will catch striped bass and other saltwater predators. Plain Giant Killers are perfect for trophy king salmon.
This classic Mepps has always been a great producer of large fish because it’s so well suited for water depths of four to 12 feet. Big musky and trophy northern pike are found in these depths all summer long.
Tandem Giant Killers feature a premium extra sharp, heavy-duty 5/0 hook and heavy-duty 3/0 trailer hook. Tandem Giant Killers weigh 1-3/4 ounces. The Giant Killer’s heavy blade and solid brass body make long casts possible with little effort.

products.title: Molix CJM 85B Casting Jig Minnow | Size: 8.5cm | 26g
products.description:
Molix CJM 85B Casting Jig Minnow | Size: 8.5cm | 26g
Description:
The CJM 85B is a hybrid lure that combines the peculiarities and the strengths of a classic metal jig with the realism and the hydrodynamics of a hard bait. The result is a sinking lipless minnow with a very high specific weight in relation to the dimensions. This lure is characterized by an excellent castability, typical of a jig and the sinuosity typical of a stick minnow. The small size of this lure faithfully imitates the size of the forage fish, the main prey of the coastal and offshore predators. This characteristic makes the lure extremely versatile both for inshore and offshore fishing. The oscillation while the bait is sinking, combined with the pauses during the retrieval, triggers the attack of the predators. The particular groove of the snout, in the front part of the bait improves its movement both with a linear retrieval and with strong jerks. The body made of ABS is very resistant. The 3D technology and the UV coating make the colors more brilliant, durable and improves the appearance.
Features: 


3D Textured Details
Hydrodinamic Profile
UV Coating
Hi-Grade ABS Body
Rod Suggested: 6.6" to 9.0" Regular Fast Action
P.E Line 1.2 to 2.5
Leader Line: Fluorocarbon or Nylon 12-30lb
Designed and Engineering by Molix in Italy.

products.title: ChatterBait JackHammer StealthBlade  | 1/2 OZ | 1 pc/pkt
products.description:
ChatterBait JackHammer StealthBlade  | 1/2 OZ 

DESCRIPTIONA valuable combination of refined energy, unpredictable action and visual stealth, the new Z-Man JackHammer StealthBlade adds an exciting new chapter to the book of the bladed jig. The driving force behind the patented new ChatterBait design, a clear polycarbonate blade produces a totally different sound and vibration, but like its predecessor, starts thumping intensely with the first half-turn of the reel handle. The blade's specialized oval split-ring line tie increases stealth, and offers less surface area and no protrusions to catch vegetation or other snags. Armed with a lighter wire, custom Decoy® fluorine nanocoated hook, the StealthBlade can be cast on slightly lighter line and penetrates the jaws of bass with less hook-setting effort. To preserve the StealthBlade's high-level, ultra-durable JackHammer heritage and performance, silicone skirts are hand-tied with stainless steel wire. Dual wire trailer keepers pin soft plastic trailers in place for the long haul. The StealthBlade's low center of gravity, fish-shaped head tracks true and skips easily. When the situation suggests a bladed jig, but instinct advises finesse, the ChatterBait JackHammer StealthBlade becomes the smartest play of the day. FEATURES

Designed in conjunction with bladed jig specialist Brett Hite
Patented ChatterBait® design and hex-shaped ChatterBlade®
Clear polycarbonate blade excels in generating strikes from pressured fish or in clear water scenarios
Starts vibrating quickly and exhibits natural hunting motion
Custom Decoy® fluorine coated hook
Wire tied silicone skirting
Low center of gravity fish-shaped head tracks true and skips easily
Dual wire trailer keepers hold soft plastic trailers securely

products.description:
CrossEyeZ Flipping Jig  | 5/8 OZ 

DESCRIPTIONDesigned by B.A.S.S. Elite Series pro and noted jig-fishing specialist David Walker, CrossEyeZ Flipping Jigs are built around heavy duty, 4/0 VMC® flipping hooks hand-picked by Walker, as well as wire trailer keepers and copper wire-tied 100% silicone skirts not found on other widely available jigs. Their unique head design performs flawlessly around all types of shallow-water cover, and their durable, color-matched head paint schemes and hallmark ‘cross eyes’ elicit close-combat strikes when other ‘ordinary’ jigs simply won’t.FEATURES

Unique head design excels around all types of shallow water cover
Built around heavy duty 4/0 VMC® flipping hook
Hand-tied 100% silicone skirts and wire trailer keeper
Durable, color matched head paint schemes
Hallmark 'cross eyes' for added attraction
Available in 3/8, 1/2, and 5/8 ounce weights

products.description:
CrossEyeZ Snakehead Swim Jig | 3/8 oz

DESCRIPTIONThe brainchild of jig fishing savant David Walker latest installment in the heralded CrossEyeZ Jig lineup, the Snakehead Swim Jig takes a cue from mother nature with a head design modeled after that of a snake to allow it to come through grass and cover easily. Like other jigs in the CrossEyeZ jig family, this jig features nothing but the best components and construction and is made from a super-hard virgin lead allow that prevents denting and paint chipping. Built on a heavy duty 4/0 VMC flipping hook, the CrossEyeZ Snakehead Swim Jig boasts a molded plastic split-grip keeper that grips all types of plastic trailers securely without affecting the perfect balance of the jig, along with skirt patterns designed by David himself that are hand-tied with copper wire for extreme longevity.FEATURES

Designed by Bassmaster Elite Series pro and jig fishing guru David Walker
Head shape modeled after a snake head, allowing it to slither through grass and other cover cleanly
Flat underside allows jig to plane up on the retrieve, allowing the use of heavier weights for longer casts
Split grip keeper holds all types of soft plastic trailers securely, including 10X Tough ElaZtech® softbaits
100% silicone skirts in an array of popular patterns hand-tied with copper wire
Built around a 4/0 heavy-duty, black nickel VMC® hook

products.title: Halco Twisty Jig | 55g-120g
products.description:
Brand Name: HALCO
Description:
Halco Twisty Jigs are ready to go, complete with swivel and heat-sealed hook. They are rigged with the finest quality components for maximum durability and feature the same unique curved-edge design as the original Twisty. These Twisty Jigs have an incredibly enticing action and can be retrieved by a slow wobble or a high speed splashing action. They are highly successful lures for rock fishing, beach fishing, or used offshore for a variety of gamefish.The flash and fluttering action on the sink is very appealing to kingfish, amberjack, Samson, coral trout, and mackerel. When targeting toothy critters the braid should be changed to the wire. Twisty jigs are an extremely effective casting lure that has survived in a competitive market longer than just about any other lure.

products.title: Halco Streaker Metal Lures
products.description:
Halco Streaker Metal Lures 
The hole in the Halco Streaker is engineered to create an exciting bubble trail, and is proven to be an exceptional fish attractant when seen from below the surface. The eight reflective sides create an attractive flash. The Halco Streaker metal lure also features a blood red teaser attached to the fish ring. This lure offers a unique combination of bubble and flash.
Features

Eight highly reflective sides


Plastic flap on rear split ring to add extra movement


Centre hole produces exciting bubble trail


Quality trebles and split rings


A unique combination of flash, movement and bubble trail


A proven Australian favourite


Tough metal material

products.title: Halco Metal Outcast Jig Metal Lures - 40G
products.description:
Halco Metal Outcast Jig Metal Lures - 40G
The all-new Halco Outcast Jig is a rear weighted baitfish profiled jigging and casting metal, designed to catch a wide range of species from high-speed pelagics to more temperate options such as tailor, salmon, and mulloway.Halco Outcast Jigs are highly versatile, attracting many bottom-feeding species including Kingfish, Sampson Fish, Coral Trout, Snapper and many more.Featuring Japanese Decoy hooks and a quality Japanese octopus skirt, the jig is rigged and ready for action.Can be rigged from either end to create either a fast drop action or a slower pitching drop.

products.title: Yo-Zuri Super Braid Line | 135-275m | Dark Green
products.description:
Yo-Zuri Dark Green SuperBraid is great for water with high runoff river systems to oceans all over the world, making it ideal for murky water situations. Due to its natural dark green color, it is a familiar color for fish to see. SuperBraid ranges from 10-40 lb test for 4 strands and 50-80 lb test for 8 strands. Our specially coated braided line gives it a maximum abrasion resistance, and extremely low stretch, and makes it super durable giving you the best possible fishing experience.
Special Heat Integration Process makes line rounder, smoother and has significantly more abrasion resistance than other braided lines
Abrasion resistance is more than twice the traditional braided line and has drastically reduced color fading too
Rounder, tighter braid, and smoother line reduce resistance and improve casting distance
When used in jigging, water is drained better and the line can be dropped smoothly minimizing resistance caused by line slack
Long-lasting dark green color is great for muddy, stained, or mossy colored water

products.title: Sunline Siglon Fluoro  Leader | 4-16lb | 10m
products.description:
While slightly lower in strength compared to nylon, the exceptional abrasion resistance of fluorocarbon makes it all but impervious to damage from wear, making for an incredibly durable line. The low initial stretch allows for good sensitivity, while like nylon, there is just enough stretch to absorb shock. The hardness of the material may take some getting used to.

Sinking speed (specific gravity): 1.78 (fast sinking speed.)
Moisture absorption: No
Flexibility: Hard 
Stretch (amount of stretch at breaking point): Yes (slightly less stretch than nylon. Low initial stretch means better sensitivity.)
 Abrasion resistance: Hard surface is resistant to scratches and damage.
Straight strength: Strong
 Knot strength: Approx. 70% of straight strength
 Refractive index: 1.42 (nearly invisible in water due to the refractive index being close to that of water (1.33)).

products.title: Sufix G-Core x13 300M Braid line | 0.205mm, 0.235mm, and 0.285mm
products.description:
Sufix G-Core x13 300M Braid line | 0.205mm, 0.235mm, and 0.285mm
Description :

This is the most reliable super line during casting, strikes and fighting action as it is built with 13 fibers (12 HMPE fibers + 1 GORE Performance Fiber in core). A single strand of GORE Performance Fiber is surrounded by 12 precision braided HMPE fibers. It has been constructed in such a way that it has no weak points which leads to strength consistency.
It is said that the GORE® Performance Fiber is the most abrasion resistant textile fiber as it is solid and round like a monofilament but has the same low stretch as the PE fibers so yes there's no more problems with gliding or knots opening! In addition, the 13-carrier construction increases the number of fibers at the knot resulting in better knot tying and stronger holding power.
It has a structure in which the Sufix 131 G-Core is much rounder than any other competitor’s 12 or 16 carrier braid. The rounder line reduces the resistance in water (while retrieving) and the abrasion caused by rod guides and obstacles in the water. The line can be prevented from internal fraying with the core fiber (GORE Performance Fiber) thus making the line more durable.
A rounder line casts farther, is more silent and is more accurate. The cancelled center hole does not allow water to enter – no water means lighter line and longer casting distances.
This Sufix 131 G-Core braided line is great for casting and jigging, when you need a relatively thin line. This Sufix 131 G-Core can be recommended for example for light-tackle salt water fishing and European predator fishing.

products.title: Daiwa J-Braid X4 Dark Green 135M | Braid Line
products.description:
DAIWA J-BRAID X4 Dark Green 135M | 0.21mm, 0.25mm, 0.29mm, 0.33mm, 0.36mm braid line
Description:
Though the 4-strand weave of the Daiwa J Braid x4 has a rougher profile, anglers benefit from its thinner diameter. Especially in higher line tests, the reduction in diameter can add precious yards to your reel spool. The tight weave helps to smooth out the profiles of this braid. It uses more material as there are more weaves per inch. Besides having a smoother profile, tightly woven braids reduce friction on the line guides and have a longer lifespan.
Like all quality polyethylene lines, Daiwa J Braid doesn’t stretch. You’ll feel every bite down to the smallest nibbles with this J Braid.

products.description:
Momoi Hi-Catch Neo Fluoro Carbon Leader 20mtr | 40lb-80lb | 0.62mm-0.91mm | Pink
Description:
Momoi has a reputation for producing some of the toughest fluorocarbons in the world, with less stretch than other suppliers’ lines. Just like the Hi-Catch Fluorocarbon, the Momoi Hi-Catch NEO Fluorocarbon is unparalleled in quality, strength and abrasion resistance. Available in a wide range of sizes from extra thin to thick, this is a utility fluorocarbon leader - it's so versatile! Ideal for Trolling, Boat Fishing, Jigging, Inshore Fishing, Casting, Lure Fishing and Edging.Disappears quickly in waterThe Momoi Hi-Catch NEO Fluorocarbon is distinguished by its bright pink color – a deliberate design innovation. Red is the first color to disappear in the water spectrum and pink, as the lightest shade, disappears first.
Features:


Material: Fluorocarbon (New MIJ Fluorocarbon)


Processing: UR Processing


Colour: Pink


High Abrasion Resistance


Hard Type


Fast Sinking


Zero Water Absorption


Invisible Pink in Water


Light Refractive Index near to that of Water


UV Block


Leader Line for Trolling, Boat Fishing, Jigging, Inshore Fishing, Casting, Lure Fishing and Edging

Hard Type

1-meter black wire with Mustad hook and quality rolling swivelA wire shark trace is an important rig to have on hand when fishing with barley. The Halco wire Shark Trace is tough and ready to go, simply tie the rolling swivel to your line and add bait to the Mustad hook. This Halco trace is designed for speed, so you can get your bait out in no time to catch species such as Dusky Sharks, Bronze Whalers, Bull Sharks and Tiger Sharks.Wire Shark Trace by Halco is 1 meter long and features black wire to add strength and ensure sharks can’t bite through your line. Available in both 100-pound and 150-pound sizes, this trace features a heavy-duty 7/0 or 9/0 Mustad hook attached by a heavy duty crimp. This hook is ideal to haul in a massive shark using live or dead baits. This wire Shark Trace by Halco is essential to add a good-sized fish to your fishing brag board.

products.title: Decoy Y-S22 Treble Hook | #8-#5/0
products.description:
The Decoy Y-S22 is a super heavy wire, saltwater treble hook designed to tackle the strongest of trophy fish.
The hook uses 2x thick wire, that extrudes into a round bend that tapers smoothly into a hook tip that curves inward for easy hook penetration and secure holding power with its low angle barb design that suppresses resistance during penetration without compromising on holding power.
Each hook shank is welded together by strong brazing to give the Y-S22 its strength.
The hook comes with a smart eye design consisting of an indentation in the wire around the hook eye to make it easy to pass heavy rings through and suppress deterioration of their strength.
The Y-S22 is saltwater ready with highly corrosion-resistant tin plating and aqua block treatment for rust inhibition.

products.title: BKK Viper-41 Treble Hook | Size: 6-3/0
products.description:
BKK Viper-41 Treble Hook 

The Viper-41 is a strong and shiny 4x treble hook designed with long and straight needle points and a very aggressive bend, developed eyeing at topwater techniques.
To reduce the overall weight of the hook and to make it stay closer to the lure we shortened the welded section of the treble, thereby also providing more flexibility to the structure.
The point is designed to maximize the hook-up rate when fishing topwater or when targeting fish that suck in the lure, while the aggressive shape of the bend ensures that the hook does not come off when the fish thrashes and jumps out of the water.
The Viper-41 is coated in Bright Tin to resist even harsh saltwater environments and comes in a wide size range  to fit a huge array of lures, from small vibes to big SW stickbaits and poppers.

products.title: Zman ZWG™ Weighted Swimbait Hook
products.description:
Zman ZWG™ Weighted Swimbait Hook
A simple solution for easily rigging—and securely holding—ElaZtech® swimbaits, the ZWG™ Weighted Swimbait hook features an innovative plastic keeper moulded on the neck of the hook that pins plastics in place, even on hard casts and missed strikes. Built around heavy-duty black nickel hooks with double-tapered needle points, ZWG hooks include a silicone bead to reduce the need for Texposing and are embossed with weights for easy identification.


A custom, refined, heavy duty EWG swimbait hook designed to grip and hold ElaZtech superplastics, the ZWG Weighted Swimbait Hook works equally well with conventional soft plastics. Conical molded plastics keeper positioned on neck of hook is easy to rig and locks bait nose in place, enhancing hookup ratios and preventing baits from sliding down after missed strikes. Positioning the hookpoint perfectly, a silicone bead also keeps the bait aligned without the need to ‘Tex-pose’ rig. Dual-tapered hookpoint maintains sticky sharpness, while its black nickel-plated finish yields excellent corrosion resistance. Slim weight profile allows baits to slide over effortlessly for easy rigging (weight stamped on lead for quick ID).

Custom heavy duty weighted EWG swimbait hook designed to hold ElaZtech® superplastics securely, but also perfectly suited for use with conventional softbaits
Conical molded plastic keeper positioned on neck of hook is easy to rig and locks nose of the bait in place, enhancing hookup ratios and preventing baits from sliding down after missed strikes
Dual-tapered hook point maintains sticky sharpness
Corrosion resistant black nickel-plated finish
Silicone bead holds hook point in place and allows for perfect alignment without the need for Texposing
Slim weight profile allows baits to slide over effortlessly for easy rigging
Weight stamped on lead weight for easy identification on the fly
Available in 3/0 (1/16-, 1/8-, 3/16-ounce), 4/0 (1/8-, 3/16-, 1/4-ounce), and 5/0 (1/8-, 3/16-1/4-ounce) sizes

products.title: Zman Finesse Eyez Minnow Style Jigheads | Pearl | 3/0 | 3pcs/pack
products.description:
Zman Finesse Eyez Minnow Style Jigheads | Pearl | 3/0 | 3pcs/pack


DESCRIPTION

The preeminent finesse jighead used for systematic finesse, swimbait and soft jerkbait fishing, this Jighead calls on a low-center-of-gravity head with Z-Man’s grooved Stabiltrack design to maintain perfect balance at all retrieve speeds, or when fished vertically. They have features such as Oversized 3D eyeballs highlight four jig color patterns, focusing predatory attention and creating a pronounced strike target.   The Finesse EyeZ being built around custom needle-point, light wire black nickel hooks, comes in two hook sizes and five jig weights: 1/12- to 3/8-oz with 1/0 or 3/0 hooks. A welded wire keeper facilitates easy, secure rigging of ElaZtech softbaits, locking them firmly into place. An ideal jighead for vertical fishing or "moping" with a StreakZ 3.75, 4" Finesse ShadZ or 4" or 5" Jerk ShadZ, or for finesse swimbait applications using a Slim SwimZ, MinnowZ, or DieZel MinnowZ. 



 
FEATURES

Ideal for finesse techniques using a variety of swimbaits and minnow style baits
Oversized eyes create prominent strike target for gamefish
Low center of gravity head with grooved Stabiltrack design for perfect balance at all retrieve speeds or when fished vertically
Built on custom needlepoint 1/0 and 3/0 light wire black nickel hooks for easy hook sets
Welded wire keeper makes rigging ElaZtech softbaits easy and holds baits in place securely

products.title: Zman TEXAS EYE™ JIGHEADS  3pcs/pkt
products.description:
Zman TEXAS EYE™ JIGHEADS  3pcs/pkt  

DESCRIPTION


Melding a weedless Texas rig with a free-pivoting jighead and the prominent strike target of oversized 3D eyes, the Texas Eye Jighead gives anglers an unbeatable one-two punch. Designed to easily shed grass and prevent fouling or snagging on wood, rock, or shell, the flat sided head and upturned line tie eyelet creates a stable jighead with a spoon-like swimming quality when paired with either paddle-tail swimbaits or straight-tail baits. The Texas Eye Jighead features beefy construction that makes it ideal for a variety of applications that require a snag-resistant presentation in fresh- or saltwater, from pitching baits to laydowns for trophy largemouth to plying the Louisiana marsh for bull redfish.




FEATURES


Swinging hook design allows for maximum bait action and easy weedless rigging
Vivid, oversized 3D eyes present a prominent target for gamefish
Molded bait keeper prevents baits from sliding down hook shank
Built with heavy-duty 3/0 VMC wide gap hooks
Sized to pair perfectly with popular MinnowZ™, DieZel MinnowZ™, and PaddlerZ™ soft plastics for a variety of fresh- and saltwater gamefish

products.title: VMC Coastal X Jighead 3/0 & 4/0 | 14g-20g
products.description:
VMC Coastal X Jighead 3/0 & 4/0
The VMC 7161CX-14 Coastal X Jighead is constructed using tin coated, hi-carbon steel, super tough, ring-eyed, needle-sharp, barbed fishing hook, molded within a 14grams bullet shaped, lead-weighted head, making it ideal for rigging sized (~2.8”-4”) soft plastic baits for both freshwater and saltwater applications.What makes this jighead unique is the shape of its hook, which has a technical locking curve (“TLC”) designed into its bend to increase its resistance to opening. The TLC places the front length and hooks tip further forward from a conventional round bend jighead hook, giving it better hook locking power to a soft plastic lure.Each packet of VMC 7161CX-14 Coastal X Jighead comes with 5 jigheads.

Armed with beefed up components like heavy duty Mustad® UltraPoint® hooks and a stainless through-wire, SnakelockZ sport the guts to stand up to bruising saltwater gamefish and heavy cover combat. products.title: Zman Trout Eye™ Jigheads 1/4 OZ 3pcs/pack
products.description:
Zman Trout Eye™ Jigheads 1/4 OZ 3pcs/pack

DESCRIPTIONDeveloped by South Carolina seatrout fishing guru Ralph Phillips, the Trout Eye Jighead is the ideal jighead for inshore saltwater fishing. Scientific research has shown that gamefish key in on the eye of a baitfish and that a visible eye is a critical determining factor in their decision whether or not to strike. Built with the largest eye possible for this jig size, the Trout Eye Jighead allows inshore anglers to capitalize on gamefish's instinctive feeding habits. Perfectly balanced for use with a variety of soft plastic bait styles, Trout Eye Jigheads feature dual, super-sharp keeper spikes that hold even 10X Tough ElaZtech® plastics securely.


FEATURES
Vivid, oversized 3D eyes for maximum attractionBuilt with heavy-duty 2/0 black nickel Mustad® UltraPoint® hooksSuper-sharp conical keeper barbs hold ElaZtech plastics securelyPair perfectly with TroutTrick®, Swimmin' TroutTrick®, MinnowZ™, StreakZ™ 3.75, and other Z-Man® plastics3 jigheads per packMade in the USA

The overwhelmingly popular Trout Eye™ Jighead has now been upsized to help trigger strikes from and tame the likes of striped bass, cobia, bull reds, trophy bass, and more. Armed with a super-strong 6/0 Mustad® UltraPoint® hook that is capable of standing up to fresh- and saltwater bruisers, the Striper Eye jighead matches up with a variety of large soft plastic swimbaits and jerk baits, including Z-Man's popular 6" SwimmerZ™, 7" Scented Jerk ShadZ™, and 8" Mag SwimZ™.




FEATURES



Oversized 3D eyes present a more prominent target for gamefish


Dual super-sharp, conical keeper spikes hold ElaZtech® and other soft plastics securely


Molded in South Carolina with heavy-duty 6/0 Mustad® UltraPoint® jig hooks capable of tackling oversized fresh- and saltwater gamefish


Offered in 1/2, 3/4, and 1 oz weights for a variety of applications


Available with Red, Pearl, Glow, and Gold 3D eyes


2 jigheads per pack

products.description:
Zman REDFISH EYE™ JIGHEADS 1/2 Oz & 3/8 Oz | 3pc/pkt

DESCRIPTION




Designed around the knowledge that gamefish target the eyes of baitfish, these jigheads sport the largest eye of any jighead in their class. Built on heavy-duty 4/0 Mustad® UltraPoint® hooks, the 30-degree neck bend of the hook places the eye at the front of the jighead, reducing snagging and fouling on shallow grass and oyster laden flats that redfish inhabit. Redfish Eye jigheads are sized to pair perfectly with a variety of 4" and 5" soft plastics, including Z-Man's Scented PaddlerZ™, Scented Jerk ShadZ™, StreakZ™, DieZel MinnowZ™, and SwimmerZ™.

Ideal not just for redfish, but for bass, seatrout, snook, flounder, small tarpon, and more

Offered in 1/8, 3/16,1/2,3/8 and 1/4 oz weights for a variety of fresh- and saltwater scenarios

products.title: Zman ZWG™ Weighted Swimbait Hook
products.description:
Zman ZWG™ Weighted Swimbait Hook
A simple solution for easily rigging—and securely holding—ElaZtech® swimbaits, the ZWG™ Weighted Swimbait hook features an innovative plastic keeper moulded on the neck of the hook that pins plastics in place, even on hard casts and missed strikes. Built around heavy-duty black nickel hooks with double-tapered needle points, ZWG hooks include a silicone bead to reduce the need for Texposing and are embossed with weights for easy identification.


A custom, refined, heavy duty EWG swimbait hook designed to grip and hold ElaZtech superplastics, the ZWG Weighted Swimbait Hook works equally well with conventional soft plastics. Conical molded plastics keeper positioned on neck of hook is easy to rig and locks bait nose in place, enhancing hookup ratios and preventing baits from sliding down after missed strikes. Positioning the hookpoint perfectly, a silicone bead also keeps the bait aligned without the need to ‘Tex-pose’ rig. Dual-tapered hookpoint maintains sticky sharpness, while its black nickel-plated finish yields excellent corrosion resistance. Slim weight profile allows baits to slide over effortlessly for easy rigging (weight stamped on lead for quick ID).

Custom heavy duty weighted EWG swimbait hook designed to hold ElaZtech® superplastics securely, but also perfectly suited for use with conventional softbaits
Conical molded plastic keeper positioned on neck of hook is easy to rig and locks nose of the bait in place, enhancing hookup ratios and preventing baits from sliding down after missed strikes
Dual-tapered hook point maintains sticky sharpness
Corrosion resistant black nickel-plated finish
Silicone bead holds hook point in place and allows for perfect alignment without the need for Texposing
Slim weight profile allows baits to slide over effortlessly for easy rigging
Weight stamped on lead weight for easy identification on the fly
Available in 3/0 (1/16-, 1/8-, 3/16-ounce), 4/0 (1/8-, 3/16-, 1/4-ounce), and 5/0 (1/8-, 3/16-1/4-ounce) sizes

products.title: Decoy Worm-13Kg Hyper Hook | #1-#4/0
products.description:
The perfect all-purpose wide gap hook for flipping and pitching into vegetation, the Decoy KG Hyper Worm 13 Hook excels with a variety of presentations when a heavy tackle approach is required to reach the fish. Utilizing an extra heavy wire and oversized barb, the KG Hyper Worm 13 Hook provides the strength to remove fish from cover with a barb that demonstrates incredible keeping power. Forged with a wide eyelet to accommodate knots with heavy fluorocarbon lines, these hooks feature a premium NS Black coating to disguise them from predators. Designed with an extra-long, inward-facing hook point positioned offset above the eye, the Decoy KG Hyper Worm13 Hooks ensure good contact with the fish on a hookset with a unique bend that prevents them from shaking loose. 
Decoy is a small Japanese company based out of the city of Nishiwaki. They are dedicated to providing anglers with the highest-quality fishing tackle for the most cutting-edge techniques on either side of the Pacific. All Decoy products are backed by strict quality control and made with an unwavering commitment to excellence that makes them ready to catch right out of the package.

products.title: Decoy KR-21 Black Nickeled Hook | #6-#1/0
products.description:
Decoy KR-21 - high quality hooks that will find their application in various types of fishing. The thickness of the wire is chosen in such a way that the hooks do not look rough and have sufficient strength to fight fairly large fish. The sting of the hook is slightly bent inward, which has a positive effect on the fight and prevents fish coming off.
Thanks to the round bend and thin wire, Decoy KR-21 hooks are perfect for fishing with vegetable baits, including corn, which will not split when put on a hook. They are used in float, feeder and carp fishing when catching any white fish, including medium-sized carp. It is also possible to use hooks of this series when fishing for pike on live bait.


This product is Made in Japan

products.description:
BKK Titan Diver+ Worm Hook
The BKK Titan Diver+ is the ultimate evolution of the Titan series.
Potentially a breakthrough in the worm hook segments, the Diver+ inherits all the features of an ordinary Titan hook – Super Slide coating, needle point, spring and silicon stopper – enhanced with a simple, intuitive and effective lead-swapping system. The system offers many different combinations to add weight to your lure as the lead can slide on the shank, stimulating the creativity of anglers in adapting it to various fishing techniques and conditions.
The bottom eyelet on the weight allows for the addition of a blade to enhance the presentation of the lure.

Replaceable lead weight
Spinning blade
SS coating

products.title: Mustad Slow Pitch  Double Jigging Assist  Rig
products.description:
The Mustad Slow Pitch J-Assist 3 Rig is designed for fast swimming fish or bottom feeders. The double hook rig features a heavy-duty solid ring tied to the wide gap Mustad hook with high quality PE and Kevlar materials. The two assist hooks are connected to the top end of the slim jigging lure to improve hookset, as the fish often strikes at the top end. Another benefit is less snags because of the absence of the traditional tail treble. The assist hook has two luminous beads to attract attention, creating a striking point. The slow pitch fishing technique has proven great on slow days when fish are not as active and less of a strain on the arms as speed jigging. These hooks were tested over a period of 2 years by Mustad's pro staff before they were launched.

products.title: Mustad 39951NPBLN Ultra Point Demon Light Gauge Circle Hooks
products.description:
Mustad 39951NPBLN Ultra Point Demon Light Gauge Circle Hooks
The Mustad Demon Circle Hook is a true circle hook featuring a wide gap, offering the best hookup ratios. No wonder it is so popular among tournament fishermen. 
The distinct curved shape of the circle hook will when the fish takes the baited hook and swallows it, ensures that the hook travels to the corner of the mouth or lip, resulting in fewer deep-hooked fish. The circle hook can be used for a whole range of applications from drifting with live bait for Tarpon or trolling for Marlin with bridle rigged live bait to deep-dropping for Swordfish. When live baiting, always choose a hook size that matches the bait. Use it to target Tuna, Marlin, Sailfish, Swordfish, Sharks, Wahoo, Halibut, Amberjack, Permit, Striped Bass, Skipjack, Bonito, Bluegill, Panfish, Sunfish, Catfish, or Alligator Gar. 
Hook Design Features:



UltraPoint technology
Chemically sharpened
Hi-carbon Steel
Specially Tempered

reviews.title: Good size, decent quality

Good sized box, fits 140mm lures comfortably. 
The 3 terminal tackle compartments on each side are a nice feature but could have had better locking mechanism. 
Slits on each slot are good to drain water and dry out moisture so risk of rusting is minimal. 
Latches do come off occasionally but clip back on easily.

products.title: Surecatch Grip Master Hi-Carbon Bent Nose Professional Fishing Pliers | 8"
products.description:
A dependable pair of pliers is essential for any angler- in fact, it is one of the most important pieces of fishing gear that you can own.
The versatility of these pliers means that you are almost certain to use them on every fishing trip.
The Surecatch Gripmaster Pliers (Bent Nose) are specifically designed for de-hooking fish.
They feature an extra-long nose that makes light work of getting into those hard-to-reach areas, such as when a fish has been hooked deep, and the angled, bent nose makes it easy to pry the hook free.
If you want to release a fish, it is paramount that you de-hook it quickly so it can be revived in the water as soon as possible to ensure its chances of survival.
They can also be used for crimping, closing split-shot sinkers and cutting lines. 
Excellent corrosion resistance
Durable
Lightweight
Large non-slip grip
8 inches in length

products.title: Jackall Bank scissors
products.description:
The line cutter is designed for portability and can be attached to a bag or looped anywhere you like. It has good handling which allows you to cut the line quickly when needed. It is also safe to use since it prevents you from touching the blade even if you accidentally put your hand on it. The design is appealing and practical, making it easy to carry around. This line cutter is perfect for shore games and combines functionality and practicality.



A revolutionary structure that reveals the blade when you squeeze the triggers on both sides of the body. The shape of the trigger has been tried repeatedly aiming for a shape that is easy to grasp. When not in use, the blade is difficult to expose and is safe. In addition, by adopting a serrated shape (serrated blade specification) for the blade part, the line is not slippery on the blade, and it can be used not only for nylon and fluorocarbon lines but also for PE lines.
By adding a carabiner to the upper part, it can be easily attached to a bag. It also includes a case to prevent the blade from flying out unexpectedly.

products.title: Jackall  Separatable Fish Scissors
products.description:
Fish can be handled easily and safely! It is disassembled and easy to clean. Scissors that can always be kept clean.The biggest feature is that the upper and lower blades can be disassembled from the caulking (the joint between the upper and lower blades). The disassembled structure makes it easy to wash and can be used cleanly at any time.We are particular about the shape of the blade, and by setting the angle diagonally to the handle, it is easy to check the target part and handle it without stressing the wrist when strangling or handling fish. Designed to.

1, it produces a "cutting effect" (an effect equivalent to cutting well when used by pulling a knife), and boasts outstanding sharpness.
 1 Upper blade approx. 65 mm Lower blade approx. 55 mm
The blade is subjected to a serration process, which is a process to make the blade edge into a zigzag shape, achieving slip resistance and comfortable cutting comfort.
Even hard parts such as bones and thorns can be cut powerfully by using the U-shaped blade provided at the base of the blade.

products.title: Jackall LT Line Cut Scissors
products.description:
Achieves light usability and outstanding sharpness. A line cutter that can cut PE-line quickly.

Light Touch Line Cut Scissors is a line cutter that can comfortably cut not only monofilament lines but also slack PE-line.
The secret to comfortably cutting the PE-line lies in the blade and caulking (the joint between the upper and lower blades).
The cutting edge is processed to have a sawtooth shape to prevent the line from slipping on the blade.It is possible to cut comfortably PE-line 
Asymmetric Cutting edge 
Large handle body

PENN Angler Pack Precision Reel Oil and Precision Reel Grease
Penn Angler Pack is designed for optimum protection on all types of tackle uses to include reels, rods, and line. Giving you the best of both worlds, value, and convenience, the Penn Angler Pack has both Penn Precision Reel Grease and Penn Synthetic Reel Oil in tackle box sizes. Both Saltwater and Freshwater Guides endorse Penn products. Tackle box size is great for your fishing excursions!

products.title: Penn Precision Reel Grease | 56,7g
products.description: Using a proprietary technology and formula  PENN oil, grease, and cleaner are built to lubricate and prevent corrosion in saltwater environments.

products.title: Okuma Reel Maintenance Kit
products.description:
The Okuma Reel Maintenance Kit gives you a jar of universal reel grease and a tube of Corrosion X Heavy Duty. This kit was put together to provide maximum protection against moisture intrusion that results in rust and corrosion. The Corrosion X HD forms a dripless, dynamic, non-hardening, self-healing film that resists corrosion from splash, spray or complete submersion in salt water.
It will also slowly break down existing rust and corrosion, remove moisture, and stop electrolysis.
Okuma Reel Maintenance Kit will also seal any further moisture out and will not dry out or crack under stress.
Features of the Okuma Reel Maintenance Kit include:


Maximum corrosion protection
Fortified with PTFE and polymers
Little or no drag acceleration
Exceptionally smooth drag performance
Superior heat and water resistance
Safe on all metals and common plastics
Reduces gear train friction for easier cranking
Corrosion X HD net weight is 0.35oz/10g
Universal Reel Grease net weight is 1.06oz/30g

products.title: Gomexus Power Knob For Shimano A,Daiwa S
products.description:
Gomexus Power Knob For Shimano A,Daiwa S
Description:




Ergonomic Design: The round, one-piece design offers a larger contact area with your palm, delivering greater torque and reducing fatigue during long fishing sessions. 


High-Quality Materials: Crafted from cold-forged aircraft aluminum, the knob is both lightweight (approximately 0.88oz/25g) and durable, providing a balance between strength and comfort. 


Smooth Operation: Equipped with two stainless steel bearings and an aluminum bushing, the knob ensures smooth and efficient rotation, enhancing the overall performance of your reel. 


Corrosion Resistance: The materials used are corrosion-resistant, making the knob suitable for both freshwater and saltwater fishing environments.


Easy Maintenance: The teardrop hole design facilitates easy cleaning, preventing the buildup of fishy odors and prolonging the life of the knob. 


Aesthetic Appeal: Available in various fashionable colors, the knob allows anglers to customize their reels to match personal preferences or existing gear.

Enhanced Grip: Ergonomically designed with non-slip surfaces to provide a secure hold, even in wet conditions, ensuring better control during retrieves.


Smooth Operation: Equipped with stainless steel bearings and aluminum bushings, the knob offers smooth and efficient rotation, reducing fatigue during extended use.


Corrosion Resistance: Built to withstand harsh saltwater environments, the materials used are corrosion-resistant, ensuring longevity and reliability.


Easy Installation: Designed for direct fitment, the knob can be installed in approximately 5 minutes without the need for drilling or special tools.

products.title: Mustad Neoprene Rod Tip Protector MTP02 | Size: S, L
products.description:
Mustad Neoprene Rod Tip Protector MTP02
Mustad Tackle Protection range of products are constructed using a high-density Neoprene foam material which has a low compression set. Compression set is the measure of a material's ability to return to its original thickness after prolonged compressive stresses. A lower compression set is generally more ideal, indicating that material would resist deformation better, hence cushioning your fishing tackle against knocks and scratches.
Neoprene is an inert material which does not react with chemicals such as oil and grease commonly used on fishing reels or any sprays used on rod guides against corrosion resistance. neoprene is also resistant to weathering, especially from UV rays which may cause flex cracking, making it an ideal material for protecting your tackle in outdoor situations.

products.title: Zman Elaztech Bait LockerZ
products.description:
Zman Elaztech Bait LockerZ
Description:
Constructed from durable 600 denier waterproof fabric, the oversized Bait LockerZ offers ample room to house over 50 packages of ElaZtech softbaits. Adjustable dividers isolate bait types and file packages upright and securely. Top flaps with magnetic closures prevent lid from blowing open while locking water out. Interior clear storage compartments with hook-and-loop closures grant additional jighead, hook and lure storage. Exterior mesh pocket holds larger items like tools and leader spools. A rugged rubberized base prevents deck slippage. For easy transport, the Bait LockerZ features a lid handle and nylon shoulder strap.
Features: 


Constructed from durable 600 denier waterproof material
Sized to hold over 75 packages of ElaZtech® baits
Rugged rubberized bottom
Adjustable dividers to separate bait types and hold packages securely
Top flaps with magnetic closures keep lid from blowing open and keep water out
No metal parts that can rust and corrode
Handle on lid and nylon shoulder strap for easy transport
Interior clear storage compartments with hook-and-loop closures for jighead and lure storage
Exterior mesh pocket holds larger items like tools and leader spools
Length: 18.5inch Width: 9inch Height: 6inch

*Baits not included.

products.title: Zman Bait BinderZ™
products.description:
Zman Bait BinderZ™ 


DESCRIPTION

The perfect storage solution for ElaZtech® soft plastics, the Bait BinderZ is designed to fit the pre-punched holes found on standard-size Z-Man bait bags. When stored in the Bait BinderZ, baits remain easily accessible and away from other soft baits that could react with the ElaZtech material. For 2019, we've redesigned the Bait BinderZ to eliminate all zippers that can rust, add an internal storage pocket, and strengthen the binder rings!Length: 11" Width: 9"





FEATURES



Designed to fit pre-punched holes on standard size Z-Man bait bags
Encourages proper storage of ElaZtech® baits in original packaging and away from other types of soft baits
Baits can be accessed without removing packaging from binder for quick bait and color changes
Tough 500 denier nylon construction for durability
Beefed up binder rings that are zinc plated for corrosion resistance
Redesigned for 2019 to eliminate zippers and add internal storage pocket
Embroidered Z-Man logo




 NO BAITS/HOOKS COME WITH THE BAG

products.title: Zman Bait BinderZ™ Doublewide
products.description:
Zman Bait BinderZ™ Doublewide
DESCRIPTIONA perfect grab-and-go storage solution for Z-Man enthusiasts, the Bait BinderZ Doublewide stores up to 20 standard size bags of ElaZtech baits side-by-side. Small, medium, and large inside clear pockets allow for generous storage of jigheads and terminal tackle along with other accessories like leader spools and small tools. The Bait BinderZ Doublewide is built with no zippers that can rust, corrode, or foul and instead used hook-and-loop closures and plastic snaps designed for quick, easy access on the water!18" wide X 12" tall.
FEATURESSide-by-side binder orientation designed to fit pre-punched holes in standard size ElaZtech® bait bags and holds up to 20 packs of Z-Man softbaitsClear plastic pockets sized to hold a variety of jigheads, terminal tackle, leader spools, and toolsSecures with plastic clips and hook-and-loop closures, so contains no zippers that will rust or foulBuilt-in handle with slip-free plastic grip
 
NO BAITS/HOOKS COME WITH THE BAG

products.title: Mustad Barrel Swivel | Size: 1-12
products.description:
Mustad Barrel Swivel 
Description:
Specially made to eliminate line twist and make a dependable, strong link between the main line and a leader, this Barrel Swivel will not let you down with it's high quality materials. When choosing a swivel always go small. Pick a swivel, which will match the breaking strength of your line. By doing this, it will give the best performance and presentation. Make sure to center the knot as you tie your fishing line to the swivel eye , as this will ensure the best rotation. Made from brass, for either saltwater or freshwater use, it also has a black nickel finish.
Features:
Has a black nickel finish
Can be used in either freshwater or saltwater

products.title: Mustad Ultrapoint Fastach Clip
products.description:
Mustad Ultrapoint Fastach Clip
Clips have a pretty mixed reputation. Many anglers absolutely swear by them. Others are more cautious, preferring a more pragmatic approach to lure and rig connections. Most anglers will have a story of how a clip has inexplicably uncoupled from the rig or lure, resulting in the loss of the best fish ever. Mustad continually refines terminal tackle design with the sole purpose of ensuring you catch more fish. The Mustad Ultrapoint Fastach Clip is the latest innovation in fishing clips and is proving to be a revelation. The first feature is the ease at which lures and rigs can be changed. It’s a very fast process. The speed of a lure change is often critical, particularly when you are going through your lure arsenal, trying to see which lure the fish you are casting at will respond to. Without a method for a quick change, the fish will often move on before you have tied the knot on your second lure. The Mustad Ultrapoint Fastach Clip is the ultimate connection. There is no way the lure can become disconnected. Even if the clip is taking mouth pressure from the fish, there is no ‘latching’ system that can come undone via pressure. The Mustad Ultrapoint Fastach Clip for sale now is available. If your budget can afford it we suggest Grabbing a couple of test weights, test the veracity of the lofty claims, and never lose a fish to clip failure or slow lure change again. Features And Specifications

Stainless Steel construction


Ideal for a quick change on most lures or tackle


Mustad Fastach Clip System


The model we sell is snap only (swivel not included)

Benefits

Allows for super-fast lure and rig changes.

Lure or rig is completely secure. There is no compressed 


the latched mechanism that can come undone in the heat of battle.


Saves a tremendous amount of time rigging, which means you have more time in the water which will translate to more fish in the boat.


Ideal for a multitude of rigs and rigging styles.

Mustad is the master innovator when it comes to terminal tackle. There are many styles of clips on the market but the Mustad Ultrapoint Fastach Clip looks to be the first clip that is foolproof and fish proof. Grab a pack or two knows and put them in your shopping trolley.

products.description:

products.title: SureCatch Bait Needle | Size: 18cm | 5Pcs
products.description:
Despite the proliferation of lures for every circumstance, particularly trolling for mega fish, the live baitfish or dead fish baits are still as popular as ever for all our favorite pelagics. While rigging or ‘baiting-up’ for this style of fishing is highly demanding, the process is made quicker and easier if you use quality tools.
The Surecatch live bait needle is ideally suited for tying bridle rigs. The bridle rig is preferred offshore for a number of reasons. Firstly, trolling a baitfish for maximum performance requires rigging the fish to swim forwards as naturally as possible; The bridle rig delivers.
Secondly, the bridle rig is well suited for running ’J’ and circle hooks, with the latter becoming the hook of choice for so many offshore flesh bait applications and game fishing tournaments.
A strong and reliable rig can be the difference between tagging your target and not getting a touch. Using the right tools, and attention to detail, can make the difference between achieving a reliable rig and a second-rate bait-up.
While tying a reliable rig and achieving peak action from our bait are the goals, we also want to be able to complete our rigs quickly. A bait that’s not in the water will never catch a fish.
Surecatch Bait needles come in a packet of 5. They’re 1mm thick and 130mm long. The eyes are easy to thread without being so big as to compromise the rig by putting big holes in your bait. The live bait needle is an essential kit for the pro angler and blue water regular. Grab a pack so you’re never without a sharp one.
FEATURES AND SPECIFICATIONS

5 x 180mm Bait Needles per Pack
180mm / 7 inches Long
0.7mm Diameter

BENEFITS

Ideal for bridle rigging small to medium-sized baits.
Perfect for rigging Slimy, Yakka, Skipjacks, Big Squid, and other baitfish.
Generous pack size delivers value for money.
Small diameter and small eyes deliver a more secure rig due to the smaller holes in your bait.

Surecatch bait needles should be your first choice for rigging live and dead fish baits. The handy five-pack and thoughtful needle design ensure value for money and reliable performance. Grab a bunch of packs so you’re never caught without a Surecatch live bait needle.
