products.title: Mustad Ultrapoint Fastach Clip
products.description:
Mustad Ultrapoint Fastach Clip
Clips have a pretty mixed reputation. Many anglers absolutely swear by them. Others are more cautious, preferring a more pragmatic approach to lure and rig connections. Most anglers will have a story of how a clip has inexplicably uncoupled from the rig or lure, resulting in the loss of the best fish ever. Mustad continually refines terminal tackle design with the sole purpose of ensuring you catch more fish. The Mustad Ultrapoint Fastach Clip is the latest innovation in fishing clips and is proving to be a revelation. The first feature is the ease at which lures and rigs can be changed. It’s a very fast process. The speed of a lure change is often critical, particularly when you are going through your lure arsenal, trying to see which lure the fish you are casting at will respond to. Without a method for a quick change, the fish will often move on before you have tied the knot on your second lure. The Mustad Ultrapoint Fastach Clip is the ultimate connection. There is no way the lure can become disconnected. Even if the clip is taking mouth pressure from the fish, there is no ‘latching’ system that can come undone via pressure. The Mustad Ultrapoint Fastach Clip for sale now is available. If your budget can afford it we suggest Grabbing a couple of test weights, test the veracity of the lofty claims, and never lose a fish to clip failure or slow lure change again. Features And Specifications

Stainless Steel construction


Ideal for a quick change on most lures or tackle


Mustad Fastach Clip System


The model we sell is snap only (swivel not included)

Saves a tremendous amount of time rigging, which means you have more time in the water which will translate to more fish in the boat.


Ideal for a multitude of rigs and rigging styles.

Mustad is the master innovator when it comes to terminal tackle. There are many styles of clips on the market but the Mustad Ultrapoint Fastach Clip looks to be the first clip that is foolproof and fish proof. Grab a pack or two knows and put them in your shopping trolley.

products.title: Self-cocking Crossbow Pistol Cross 80 Lbs
products.description:
Self-cocking Crossbow Pistol Cross 80 Lbs
This 80 lb draw weight crossbow uses an easy and safe-to-use cocking mechanism. Manufactured with a strong plastic body and compressed molded fiberglass bow, this crossbow pistol is very durable and perfect for target practice. With a firing speed of 165 fps, the 80 lb crossbow is great for small games. The new self-cocking mechanism is much more safe and far less strenuous to use. By simply pulling down on a pivoting arm lever, this crossbow's cable is cocked much more easily, even engaging the safety automatically. The speediness of the new cocking mechanism shortens reload time, allowing you to get off more shots quickly. Like all weapons and gear, proper maintenance is essential in prolonging the life of your crossbow. With each use, elements of the crossbow can begin to wear. We also recommend applying rail lube often to your crossbow's rail slide and wax to your string to decrease the friction that can hurt your string. It's also recommended to check the tightness of your crossbow's screws often as vibration can loosen them over time.



Launches bolts more than 100 yards
Fiber-graphite limbs; die-cast alloy/solid brass body
Sighting, windage, elevation wheels click-tune for accuracy
Measures approximately 18" x 6"
Includes three 6" aluminum arrows
Automatic safety






Note: There is no cash-on-delivery option available for Crossbow.

products.title: Flareon Roundhouse Tripod
products.description:
Flareon Roundhouse Tripod

Product Details 
Our Roundhouse Tripod is portable barbecue grill featuring a round kettle design that provides better heat retention and allows you to add a delicious smoky flavour to your food. Made of mild steel and protected with a porcelain-enamel coating, our grills provide you with the best in terms of quality, aesthetics, and sturdiness.
Product Size: 58 x 50 x 79cmFire Bowl: 45.8cm x 0.8mmCooking Height: 58.5cmCooking Grid: 44cmCharcoal Grid: 35.5cmLid: 47.5 x 10.8cm x 0.4mmLeg: 2.2cm x 0.5mm
 

















Aluminum Damper

The grill features an aluminum intake damper that provides rust resistance and an easy intake of oxygen to keep your barbecue alive and burning. The damper sits on a dome-shaped lid that circulates the air perfectly for smoking.

















Ash Catcher

A removable ash catcher made of galvanized steel sits right below the charcoal bowl and catches any ash that falls out, avoiding any sort of a mess on your floor and makes for an easy clean-up.

















Cooking Grate

The removable steel plated cooking grate provides a durable and sturdy cooking area of 1520 sq cm, that is not only large enough for all your barbecue needs, but also quite easy to clean.



















Bowl and Charcoal Grate

The bowl itself is protected with a porcelain-enamel coating, making it heat resistant and waterproof, allowing you to clean the bowl post use with minimum effort. A second steel plated grate at the bottom of the bowl provides an elevated platform to place your charcoal on. Not only does this help in keeping your charcoal separate from ash, but also allows for even burning due to the additional circulation it provides.

















Handle and Wheels

Mild steel handles on either side of the bowl, combined with all-weather wheels attached to stainless steel legs, make the Roundhouse Tripod easy to move around and able to withstand all outdoor conditions.

















From the Manufacturer

Our grills are made of quality materials and incorporate a bunch of features keeping in mind the requirements of your inner chef.

It is coming with normal charger, which cannot be charged easily at the fishing spots or anywhere we don't have electrical power points.
It cannot be charged by using power bank.
It will do its job as a headlight, but don't buy it, if you are expecting your headlight to be charged anywhere with an USB cable.

products.description:
Princeton Tec Axis LED Headlamp
The Axis was designed to create one simple to use headlamp packing tons of functionality and allowing for customized light control for a variety of situations.
The Axis features a simple, intuitive hybrid control system- a button to move you through red, spot and flood modes, and a dial to provide complete dimmability in every mode to help find the sweet spot for any task. Whether it requires a long-reaching spot beam, night vision preserving and campsite friendly red mode and anything in between, the Axis has you covered.

products.title: Princeton Tec Sync LED Headlamp
products.description:
Princeton Tec Sync LED Headlamp
Extremely glove friendly and intuitively used, the Princeton Tec Sync is operated via dial-activation. This headlamp bypasses button pressing sequences by turning the dial to switch between modes quickly and simply and eliminates the need to remove gloves. This light offers three modes, including a red beam for preserving night vision and a dual white mode for an even stronger light output that combines both its flood and spot beams.

products.title: Princeton Tec Bot LED HeadLamp
products.description:
Princeton Tec Bot LED Headlamp
Small, simple, and ready for action, meet Bot. The smallest member of The Family is designed with the same ergonomic features of the other members, but with a fun and bright PTec twist. Two Ultrabright LEDs housed in a colorful body will certainly be the center of attention, but look beyond that. The Bot is built with the same ruggedness and reliability as the rest of the headlamps in The Family. Durable plastics, a single arm bracket, and large push button make the Bot sturdy and simple to operate. In addition, the battery compartment on the Bot screws shut to ensure that the batteries will not be accidentally accessed by little fingers.

products.title: Wave Theory Reef Gangster Jersey | Size-M-XXXL
products.description: Introducing the "Reef Gangster" Fishing Jersey: the ultimate catch for fishing enthusiasts who love to make a splash! Featuring the mighty Giant Trevally - the bad boy of the ocean - leaping out of the water to snatch a fishing popper lure, this jersey embodies the thrill and excitement of your favorite aquatic pastime.Why should the fish have all the fun? With the Reef Gangster Fishing Jersey, you'll be the center of attention both on and off the water. This eye-catching design captures the GT's notorious nickname in a vibrant and quirky manner, making it a must-have addition to any angler's wardrobe.Constructed from high-quality, moisture-wicking fabric, this jersey keeps you cool and dry in the heat of the battle against the ocean's most cunning predator. It protects you from the sun so you can wear it all day long without a care, and the relaxed fit provides the perfect balance of comfort and style.

This jersey is perfect for every kind of outdoor activity. It is light, breathable, and comfortable. It comes with a hood to protect you from the sun while fishing.

The jersey is sewn in a raglan cut to provide a better fitting and comfort.

products.title: Wave Theory | Arm Sleeve
products.description:
Wave Theory Arm Sleeves - the perfect fishing companions to shield your arms from the sun while showcasing captivating fishing-themed designs. Designed for comfort and style, these sleeves keep you protected and looking sharp.
Made with high-quality fabric, Wave Theory Arm Sleeves provide a barrier against the sun's rays, ensuring all-day comfort on the water. With a range of fishing-themed designs, you'll stand out among fellow anglers.
Flexibility and breathability are at the forefront of these sleeves. Move with agility as you reel in your catch, thanks to their premium moisture-wicking technology.
Versatile beyond fishing, Wave Theory Arm Sleeves are perfect for outdoor activities. Whether hiking, biking, golfing, or gardening, they offer sun protection without compromising style.
Join the league of adventurous anglers with Wave Theory Arm Sleeves. Comfort, eye-catching designs, and functionality combine to make them the essential accessory for any fishing enthusiast. Embrace the sun-soaked adventures and keep your arms covered in style.

products.title: BKK Arm Sleeves | Size: M-XL
products.description:
﻿BKK Arm Sleeves
The BKK Arm Sleeves are aimed at providing ultimate protection to anglers when fishing in warm weather conditions.
They are made of very light weight and thin fabric that does not impede the body’s ability to regulate body temperature and it is highly stretchable in order to allow full range of motion.
Furthermore, the arm sleeves go through an accurate UV blocking treatment that protects anglers form UV radiations when fishing for a long time under extremely hot sun, preventing harm to the skin. Last but not least, the sleek design of these arm sleeves is a real boost to your fishing outfit.

products.title: Lucana Sunglasses
products.description:
Lucana Sunglasses' polarized lenses not only look stylish but also reduce glare and enhance clarity for a visually stunning experience. Whether you're wandering through city streets, exploring the great outdoors, or soaking up the sun, these sunglasses provide exceptional glare reduction, allowing you to see with unparalleled sharpness and detail.
This Sunglasses prioritize the protection of UV400 by shielding your eyes from 100% of harmful UVA and UVB rays. Enjoy the outdoors without compromising your vision, safeguarding your eyes from the sun's damaging effects while staying stylish.
Lucana Sunglasses blend fashion with functionality, designed with meticulous attention to detail. The frames are sleek, contemporary, and durable, making them a reliable companion for all your daily activities.
Looking for a stylish and technologically advanced eyewear that makes a bold statement? Look no further than Lucana Sunglasses with polarized lenses and UV400 protection. These sunglasses redefine your vision, giving you the confidence to step out in style while effortlessly protecting your eyes. With Lucana Sunglasses, you can embrace a brighter, clearer world where fashion meets advanced eye protection.
